text: package_name package name character string fun function name character string include package functions returned ("package "), functions except base R operators ("operators"), functions ("")?

title: List the functions in a package that depend on a function — find_function_dependencies
List the functions in a package that depend on a function — find_function_dependencies
code: find_function_dependencies("codeInspectr", "find_recursive_dependencies") #> [1] "find_function_dependencies" "package_functions"          body(codeInspectr::find_recursive_dependencies) #> { #>     funs <- package_functions(package_name) #>     if (!fun %in% funs) { #>         cli::cli_abort("Function {.fn {fun}} is not a function in package {.pkg {package_name}}") #>     } #>     seen <- character(0) #>     dep_vec <- character(0) #>     stack <- fun #>     while (length(stack) > 0) { #>         cur_fun <- stack[1] #>         stack <- stack[-1] #>         seen <- c(seen, cur_fun) #>         new_deps <- find_function_dependencies(package_name,  #>             cur_fun) #>         if (!is.null(pattern_ignore)) { #>             multi_grep <- function(x) { #>                 grep(x, new_deps, value = TRUE) #>             } #>             ignore_ls <- purrr::map(pattern_ignore, multi_grep) #>             ignore_vec <- unique(do.call(c, ignore_ls)) #>             new_deps <- setdiff(new_deps, ignore_vec) #>         } #>         dep_vec <- unique(c(dep_vec, new_deps)) #>         if (!is.null(pattern_dont_recurse)) { #>             multi_grep <- function(x) { #>                 grep(x, new_deps, value = TRUE) #>             } #>             dont_recurse_ls <- purrr::map(pattern_dont_recurse,  #>                 multi_grep) #>             dont_recurse_vec <- unique(do.call(c, dont_recurse_ls)) #>             new_deps <- setdiff(new_deps, dont_recurse_vec) #>         } #>         stack <- unique(c(stack, new_deps)) #>         stack <- setdiff(stack, seen) #>     } #>     return(setdiff(dep_vec, fun)) #> }
